oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Utilities Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chairman Jim Crosby and the Utilities Subcommittee met 12 times between February and July 1980. Topics discussed include the future of rural utility districts under consolidation, the power structure of the proposed Utilities Board, and utility costs under consolidation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Public utilities--Tennessee; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
